name: unbusinesslike
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not showing the behaviour or qualities that are expected in business: I feel it is unbusinesslike and rude to completely ignore my correspondence. I didn't mind the nickname, but others might think it sounded unbusinesslike.
More examplesFewer examplesThe association wants to distance itself from such unbusinesslike attitudes. They have marked themselves down as being unbusinesslike and difficult to deal with. The whole thing was most unbusinesslike.She never loses her temper and reacts politely to even the most unbusinesslike inquiries.
